rooms.name: Double Room With Balcony
rooms.description: The double room includes a private bathroom, well-fitted with a walk-in shower, a bath, a bidet, a hairdryer and slippers. The spacious air-conditioned double room provides a flat-screen TV with streaming services, soundproof walls, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker as well as mountain views. The unit offers 1 bed.

rooms.name: Double Room

rooms.name: Suite With Bathtub
rooms.description: This suite offers a hot tub. This spacious suite comprises 1 bedroom, a seating area and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a bath.
